TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerOptionService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerOptionService
Public MustInherit Class DesignerOptionService Implements IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供用于获取和设置设计器选项值的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的选项的集合。The class provides a collection of options. 每个这些选项集合具有索引，使它能够实现进一步的筛选器。Each of these option collections has an indexer that enables it to be further filtered. 每个选项集合包含其自己的组的选项，以及所有其子选项的汇总。Each option collection contains its own set of options, as well as a rollup of all of its child options. 发生命名冲突之间属性时，最外面的选项对象将优先。In the event of a naming conflict between properties, the outermost options object takes precedence. 以下**工具|选项**用户界面 (UI) 结构显示如何最外面的选项对象具有更高的重要性：The following **Tools | Options** user interface (UI) structure shows how the outermost options object takes on greater importance: **WindowsFormsDesigner | General****WindowsFormsDesigner | General** - **SnapToGrid****SnapToGrid** - **ShowGrid****ShowGrid** - **GridSize****GridSize** 给定名为`service`，若要获取的值属性，将进行以下调用：Given a named `service`, to get to the value of the property, you would make the following call: [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)] 此方法有效，直到您想要移动到另一页。This works, until you want to move to another page. 此外，不提供任何发现机制。Also, provides no discovery mechanism. 如果你不知道要传入的字符串，该服务找不到属性值。If you do not know what string to pass in, the service cannot find the property value. 类可以解决这些问题。The class addresses these issues. 你可以查询集合，并且没有上定义的类型转换器将标记为可展开的集合的对象。You can query collections, and there is a type converter defined on the object that marks the collection as expandable. 使用此类型转换器，可将整个设计器选项服务传递给属性窗口，并以可视方式检查服务。With this type converter, you can pass the entire designer option service to a property window and visually inspect the service. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问以显示标准选项的当前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数指定的对象中使用的公共属性选项集合的集合。The `value` parameter specifies an object whose public properties are used in the collection of the option collection. `value`参数可以为`null`如果此选项集合不提供任何属性。The `value` parameter can be `null` if this options collection does not offer any properties. 属性的方式将任何内容传递到的组件参数，它包装将被忽略，和`value`替换对象。Properties are wrapped in such a way that passing anything into the component parameter of the is ignored, and the `value` object is substituted.

span.span: or is .
is an empty string.

summary.span: 获取此服务的选项集合。

span.span: Gets the options collection for this service.

value.span: 用可用的设计器选项进行填充的 。

span.span: A populated with available designer options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终是一个包含子集合的全局选项集合。There is always a global options collection that contains child collections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过命名索引器导航集合，以便你可以获取的值`GridSize`选项。The following code example shows how you can navigate the collections by named indexers so you can get the value of the `GridSize` option. 所有三个变体都返回相同的值。All three variations return the same value. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/CS/designeroptionservicecontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerOptionService/VB/designeroptionservicecontrol.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对次时按需第一个子选项或选项集合的属性的用户要求调用方法。The method is called on demand the first time a user asks for child options or properties of an options collection. 你可以填充`options`集合通过调用方法并传递与父项的此集合。You can populate the `options` collection by calling the method and passing this collection as the parent.
